body: We have shipped a couple pioneer add-ons now. They have checks in the recipes' filter expressions and also in the add-ons themselves via pioneer-utils. I don't think we need a third check that the pioneer opt-in is set. I also don't think the #1026 is going to go anywhere. Closing this out as wontfix.
